intro: Psychotria ansellii, commonly known as the Ansell's Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly found in the understory of humid forests. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, round berries that are typically red when mature. Psychotria ansellii is known for its role in traditional medicine and its ecological importance in supporting local wildlife.
